title: Borussia Dortmund - Wikipedia
snippet: Borussia Dortmund GmbH & Co. KGaA became the first and, so far, the only publicly traded sports club on the German stock market. 4.61% of Borussia Dortmund GmbH & Co. KGaA is owned by the sports club, Borussia Dortmund e.V.; 8.24% by Bernd Geske; and 67.24% widely spread shareholdings.

title: Borussia Dortmund GmbH : Shareholders Board Members Managers and Company Profile | DE0005493092 | MarketScreener
snippet: Borussia Dortmund GmbH & Co KGaA is a Germany-based company engaged in the operation of Ballspielverein Borussia (BVB), a professional football club based in Dortmund, Germany. The Company has around 8 functional areas such as sports, communications, human resources, organization, finance, legal and IR, marketing and digitalization, commercial partnerships.

title: Hans-Joachim Watzke - Wikipedia
snippet: Hans-Joachim "Aki" Watzke (born 21 June 1959, Marsberg, North Rhine-Westphalia) is a German businessman and football official. He served as the CEO of Borussia Dortmund from 2005 until 2025 and is the club's elected president since November 23, 2025.
